data.name: Maria G.
data.title: Digital Nomad
data.quote: I used to dread splitting costs on group trips — now it's automatic. The receipt scanner is insanely accurate, and the chatbot gives amazing insights.

data.name: Victor C.
data.title: Co-Living in Berlin
data.quote: We used to argue over bills. Now everyone knows exactly who owes what, and we settle in seconds. Honestly, this app saved our house dynamic.

data.name: Mia J.
data.title: Product Manager
data.quote: The AI insights are a game changer. It flagged patterns I hadn’t noticed in my spending and helped me cut back. More than just bill splitting — it’s a smart financial assistant.

data.name: John O.
data.title: Senior Architect
data.quote: I’m often out with clients or my project team. Being able to scan a receipt and instantly split it saves so much time — and the interface is beautiful.
